name: yield-calculator
title: Yield Calculator
description: Calculte your interests, APY / APR using our calculator.
author: Decrypt

commands.name: yield-calculator
commands.title: Calculate Interests
commands.description: This command helps you calculate your interests. APY or APR, on multiple time frames.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
